name: Authentik
description: Open-source Identity Provider with SSO, OAuth2, SAML, and LDAP support.
author: StumpfWorks
compose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  postgresql:
    image: postgres:16-alpine
    container_name: authentik-db
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      - POSTGRES_PASSWORD={{POSTGRES_PASSWORD}}
      - POSTGRES_USER=authentik
      - POSTGRES_DB=authentik
    volumes:
      - {{DATA_PATH}}/database:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=authentik"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=security"

  redis:
    image: redis:alpine
    container_name: authentik-redis
    restart: unless-stopped
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=authentik"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=security"

  server:
    image: ghcr.io/goauthentik/server:latest
    container_name: authentik-server
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: server
    environment:
      - AUTHENTIK_REDIS__HOST=redis
      - AUTHENTIK_POSTGRESQL__HOST=postgresql
      - AUTHENTIK_POSTGRESQL__USER=authentik
      - AUTHENTIK_POSTGRESQL__NAME=authentik
      - AUTHENTIK_POSTGRESQL__PASSWORD={{POSTGRES_PASSWORD}}
      - AUTHENTIK_SECRET_KEY={{AUTHENTIK_SECRET_KEY}}
      - AUTHENTIK_ERROR_REPORTING__ENABLED={{AUTHENTIK_ERROR_REPORTING}}
    ports:
      - "{{PORT}}:9000"
      - "{{HTTPS_PORT}}:9443"
    volumes:
      - {{DATA_PATH}}/media:/media
      - {{DATA_PATH}}/custom-templates:/templates
    depends_on:
      - postgresql
      - redis
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=authentik"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=security"

  worker:
    image: ghcr.io/goauthentik/server:latest
    container_name: authentik-worker
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: worker
    environment:
      - AUTHENTIK_REDIS__HOST=redis
      - AUTHENTIK_POSTGRESQL__HOST=postgresql
      - AUTHENTIK_POSTGRESQL__USER=authentik
      - AUTHENTIK_POSTGRESQL__NAME=authentik
      - AUTHENTIK_POSTGRESQL__PASSWORD={{POSTGRES_PASSWORD}}
      - AUTHENTIK_SECRET_KEY={{AUTHENTIK_SECRET_KEY}}
      - AUTHENTIK_ERROR_REPORTING__ENABLED={{AUTHENTIK_ERROR_REPORTING}}
    volumes:
      - {{DATA_PATH}}/media:/media
      - {{DATA_PATH}}/certs:/certs
      - {{DATA_PATH}}/custom-templates:/templates
    depends_on:
      - postgresql
      - redis
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=authentik"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=security"

notes: Generate strong secret key before deployment
Initial setup wizard on first access
Supports OAuth2, SAML, LDAP, and more
Can be used for SSO across multiple applications
